title: Edges as subsets of vertices of graphs

blocks.name: uhgredgiedgb
blocks.content: In a hypergraph, a set is an edge iff it is an indexed edge. (Contributed by AV, 17-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: uhgriedg0edg0
blocks.content: A hypergraph has no edges iff its edge function is empty. (Contributed by AV, 21-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 8-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: uhgredgn0
blocks.content: An edge of a hypergraph is a nonempty subset of vertices. (Contributed by AV, 28-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: edguhgr
blocks.content: An edge of a hypergraph is a subset of vertices. (Contributed by AV, 26-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 28-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: uhgredgrnv
blocks.content: An edge of a hypergraph contains only vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Feb-2018.) (Revised by AV, 4-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: uhgredgss
blocks.content: The set of edges of a hypergraph is a subset of the power set of vertices without the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 29-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: upgredgss
blocks.content: The set of edges of a pseudograph is a subset of the set of unordered pairs of vertices. (Contributed by AV, 29-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: umgredgss
blocks.content: The set of edges of a multigraph is a subset of the set of unordered pairs of vertices. (Contributed by AV, 25-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: edgupgr
blocks.content: Properties of an edge of a pseudograph. (Contributed by AV, 8-Nov-2020.)

  elrab(hs0, c1, cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cle, nat2), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, nat2))
  breq1d(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cle, nat2, cfv(chash, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, chash)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cupgr), wi(wa(wcel(c1, cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), csn(emptycls))), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, nat2)), w3a(wcel(c1, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))), wne(c1, emptycls), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, nat2))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c1, cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), csn(emptycls))), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, nat2)), w3a(wcel(c1, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))), wne(c1, emptycls), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, nat2)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))), wne(c1, emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, nat2)))
  anim1i(wcel(c1, cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), csn(emptycls))), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, nat2), wa(wcel(c1, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))), wne(c1, emptycls)))

thm edgupgr(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ UPGraph ∧ c1 ∈(Edg ` c0))→(c1 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0))∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧(# ` c1)[≤]2))
} = {
  imp(c0 ∈ UPGraph, c1 ∈(Edg ` c0), (c1 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0))∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧(# ` c1)[≤]2))
  sylbid(c0 ∈ UPGraph, c1 ∈(Edg ` c0), (c1 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0))∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧(# ` c1)[≤]2), c1 ∈ ran((iEdg ` c0)))
  eleq2d(c1, (Edg ` c0), ran((iEdg ` c0)), c0 ∈ UPGraph)
  a1i(c0 ∈ UPGraph, (Edg ` c0)= ran((iEdg ` c0)))
  edgval(c0)
  syld(c0 ∈ UPGraph, c1 ∈ ran((iEdg ` c0)), (c1 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0))∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧(# ` c1)[≤]2), c1 ∈ { hs0 ∈(P((Vtx ` c0))\ { ∅ })|(# ` hs0)[≤]2 })
  sseld(c1, ran((iEdg ` c0)), { hs0 ∈(P((Vtx ` c0))\ { ∅ })|(# ` hs0)[≤]2 }, c0 ∈ UPGraph)
  frnd((iEdg ` c0), { hs0 ∈(P((Vtx ` c0))\ { ∅ })|(# ` hs0)[≤]2 }, dom((iEdg ` c0)), c0 ∈ UPGraph)
  upgrf(hs0, c0, (iEdg ` c0), (Vtx ` c0))
  eqid((Vtx ` c0))
  eqid((iEdg ` c0))
  syl5bi(c0 ∈ UPGraph, c1 ∈ { hs0 ∈(P((Vtx ` c0))\ { ∅ })|(# ` hs0)[≤]2 }, (c1 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0))∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧(# ` c1)[≤]2), (c1 ∈(P((Vtx ` c0))\ { ∅ })∧(# ` c1)[≤]2))
  elrab(hs0, c1, (P((Vtx ` c0))\ { ∅ }), (# ` hs0)[≤]2, (# ` c1)[≤]2)
  breq1d((# ` hs0), cle, nat2, (# ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, chash)
  a1i(c0 ∈ UPGraph, ((c1 ∈(P((Vtx ` c0))\ { ∅ })∧(# ` c1)[≤]2)→(c1 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0))∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧(# ` c1)[≤]2)))
  sylibr((c1 ∈(P((Vtx ` c0))\ { ∅ })∧(# ` c1)[≤]2), (c1 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0))∧ c1 ≠ ∅ ∧(# ` c1)[≤]2), ((c1 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0))∧ c1 ≠ ∅)∧(# ` c1)[≤]2))
  anim1i(c1 ∈(P((Vtx ` c0))\ { ∅ }), (# ` c1)[≤]2, (c1 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0))∧ c1 ≠ ∅))
  biimpi(c1 ∈(P((Vtx ` c0))\ { ∅ }), (c1 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0))∧ c1 ≠ ∅))
  eldifsn(c1, P((Vtx ` c0)), emptycls)
  df-3an(c1 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0)), c1 ≠ ∅, (# ` c1)[≤]2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Vtx ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((P((Vtx ` c0))\ { ∅ }))
  diff.hs0.w((# ` c1)[≤]2)
}

blocks.name: uhgrvtxedgiedgb
blocks.content: In a hypergraph, a vertex is incident with an edge iff it is contained in an element of the range of the edge function. (Contributed by AV, 24-Dec-2020.) (Revised by AV, 6-Jul-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm uhgrvtxedgiedgb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wrex(s0, cdm(c3), wcel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wrex(s1, c4, wcel(c1, cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  bicomd(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, cdm(c3), wcel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wrex(s1, c4, wcel(c1, cv(s1))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wrex(s1, c4, wcel(c1, cv(s1))), wrex(s0, cdm(c3), wcel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wrex(s1, c4, wcel(c1, cv(s1))), wrex(s0, cdm(c3), wcel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wrex(s1, crn(c3), wcel(c1, cv(s1))))
  rexeqdv(s1, c4, crn(c3), wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, cv(s1)))
  3eqtr4g(c4, crn(c3), cfv(cedg, c0), crn(cfv(ciedg, c0)), wcel(c0, cuhgr))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wceq(cfv(cedg, c0), crn(cfv(ciedg, c0))))
  edgval(c0)
  rneqi(c3, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wb(wrex(s1, crn(c3), wcel(c1, cv(s1))), wrex(s0, cdm(c3), wcel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), wfn(c3, cdm(c3)))
  funfnd(c3, wcel(c0, cuhgr))
  uhgrfun(c0, c3)
  rexrn(s1, s0, c3, cdm(c3), wcel(c1, cv(s1)), wcel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  eleq2(cv(s1), cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1)
  diff.crn.s(s1, c3)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c3)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c3, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uhgrvtxedgiedgb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ UHGraph ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(∃(s0 ∈ dom(c3), c1 ∈(c3 ` s0))↔ ∃(s1 ∈ c4, c1 ∈ s1)))
  ⊣ c3 =(iEdg ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(Edg ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  bicomd((c0 ∈ UHGraph ∧ c1 ∈ c2), ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c3), c1 ∈(c3 ` s0)), ∃(s1 ∈ c4, c1 ∈ s1))
  adantr(c0 ∈ UHGraph, c1 ∈ c2, (∃(s1 ∈ c4, c1 ∈ s1)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c3), c1 ∈(c3 ` s0))))
  bitrd(c0 ∈ UHGraph, ∃(s1 ∈ c4, c1 ∈ s1), ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c3), c1 ∈(c3 ` s0)), ∃(s1 ∈ ran(c3), c1 ∈ s1))
  rexeqdv(s1, c4, ran(c3), c0 ∈ UHGraph, c1 ∈ s1)
  3eqtr4g(c4, ran(c3), (Edg ` c0), ran((iEdg ` c0)), c0 ∈ UHGraph)
  a1i(c0 ∈ UHGraph, (Edg ` c0)= ran((iEdg ` c0)))
  edgval(c0)
  rneqi(c3, (iEdg ` c0))
  syl(c0 ∈ UHGraph, (∃(s1 ∈ ran(c3), c1 ∈ s1)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c3), c1 ∈(c3 ` s0))), c3[Fn]dom(c3))
  funfnd(c3, c0 ∈ UHGraph)
  uhgrfun(c0, c3)
  rexrn(s1, s0, c3, dom(c3), c1 ∈ s1, c1 ∈(c3 ` s0))
  eleq2(s1, (c3 ` s0), c1)
  diff.crn.s(s1, c3)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c3)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c1, (c3 ` s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: upgredg
blocks.content: For each edge in a pseudograph, there are two vertices which are connected by this edge. (Contributed by AV, 4-Nov-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 26-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm upgredg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c1, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c1, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c1, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c1, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(c1, crab(hs0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cle, nat2))))
  imp(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, crab(hs0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cle, nat2))))
  sylbid(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, crab(hs0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cle, nat2))), wcel(c1, crn(cfv(ciedg, c0))))
  eleq2d(c1, c2, crn(cfv(ciedg, c0)), wcel(c0, cupgr))
  syl5eq(c2, crn(cfv(ciedg, c0)), cfv(cedg, c0), wcel(c0, cupgr))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cupgr), wceq(cfv(cedg, c0), crn(cfv(ciedg, c0))))
  edgval(c0)
  sseld(c1, crn(cfv(ciedg, c0)), crab(hs0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cle, nat2)), wcel(c0, cupgr))
  frnd(cfv(ciedg, c0), crab(hs0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cle, nat2)), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)), wcel(c0, cupgr))
  upgrf(hs0, c0, cfv(ciedg, c0), c3)
  eqid(cfv(ciedg, c0))
  sylbi(wcel(c1, crab(hs0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cle, nat2))), wrex(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c1, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(c1, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls))), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, nat2)))
  elrab(hs0, c1, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cle, nat2), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, nat2))
  breq1d(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cle, nat2, cfv(chash, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, chash)
  biimpa(wcel(c1, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls))), wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, nat2), wrex(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c1, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  hashle2prv(s0, s1, c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cfv(chash, c1), cle, nat2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm upgredg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ UPGraph ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, ∃(s1 ∈ c3, c1 = { s0, s1 })))
  ⊣ c3 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(Edg ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ UPGraph ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, ∃(s1 ∈ c3, c1 = { s0, s1 }))), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ UPGraph ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, ∃(s1 ∈ c3, c1 = { s0, s1 }))), d(s1, c0))
  syl((c0 ∈ UPGraph ∧ c1 ∈ c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, ∃(s1 ∈ c3, c1 = { s0, s1 })), c1 ∈ { hs0 ∈(P(c3)\ { ∅ })|(# ` hs0)[≤]2 })
  imp(c0 ∈ UPGraph, c1 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ { hs0 ∈(P(c3)\ { ∅ })|(# ` hs0)[≤]2 })
  sylbid(c0 ∈ UPGraph, c1 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ { hs0 ∈(P(c3)\ { ∅ })|(# ` hs0)[≤]2 }, c1 ∈ ran((iEdg ` c0)))
  eleq2d(c1, c2, ran((iEdg ` c0)), c0 ∈ UPGraph)
  syl5eq(c2, ran((iEdg ` c0)), (Edg ` c0), c0 ∈ UPGraph)
  a1i(c0 ∈ UPGraph, (Edg ` c0)= ran((iEdg ` c0)))
  edgval(c0)
  sseld(c1, ran((iEdg ` c0)), { hs0 ∈(P(c3)\ { ∅ })|(# ` hs0)[≤]2 }, c0 ∈ UPGraph)
  frnd((iEdg ` c0), { hs0 ∈(P(c3)\ { ∅ })|(# ` hs0)[≤]2 }, dom((iEdg ` c0)), c0 ∈ UPGraph)
  upgrf(hs0, c0, (iEdg ` c0), c3)
  eqid((iEdg ` c0))
  sylbi(c1 ∈ { hs0 ∈(P(c3)\ { ∅ })|(# ` hs0)[≤]2 }, ∃(s0 ∈ c3, ∃(s1 ∈ c3, c1 = { s0, s1 })), (c1 ∈(P(c3)\ { ∅ })∧(# ` c1)[≤]2))
  elrab(hs0, c1, (P(c3)\ { ∅ }), (# ` hs0)[≤]2, (# ` c1)[≤]2)
  breq1d((# ` hs0), cle, nat2, (# ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, chash)
  biimpa(c1 ∈(P(c3)\ { ∅ }), (# ` c1)[≤]2, ∃(s0 ∈ c3, ∃(s1 ∈ c3, c1 = { s0, s1 })))
  hashle2prv(s0, s1, c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((P(c3)\ { ∅ }))
  diff.hs0.w((# ` c1)[≤]2)
}

blocks.name: umgredg
blocks.content: For each edge in a multigraph, there are two distinct vertices which are connected by this edge. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 9-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 25-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm umgredg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c3, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cedg, c0))

blocks.name: upgrpredgv
blocks.content: An edge of a pseudograph always connects two vertices if the edge contains two sets. The two vertices/sets need not necessarily be different (loops are allowed). (Contributed by AV, 18-Nov-2021.)

thm upgrpredgv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ UPGraph ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ { c1, c3 } ∈ c5)→(c1 ∈ c6 ∧ c3 ∈ c6))

  ⊣ c5 =(Edg ` c0)
} = {
  mpd((c0 ∈ UPGraph ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ { c1, c3 } ∈ c5), (c1 ∈ c6 ∧ c3 ∈ c6), ∃(hs0 ∈ c6, ∃(hs1 ∈ c6, { c1, c3 } = { hs0, hs1 })))
  3adant2(c0 ∈ UPGraph, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), { c1, c3 } ∈ c5, ∃(hs0 ∈ c6, ∃(hs1 ∈ c6, { c1, c3 } = { hs0, hs1 })))
  upgredg(hs0, hs1, c0, { c1, c3 }, c5, c6)
  rexlimdvva(hs0, hs1, c6, c6, (c0 ∈ UPGraph ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ { c1, c3 } ∈ c5), { c1, c3 } = { hs0, hs1 }, (c1 ∈ c6 ∧ c3 ∈ c6))
  sylbid(((c0 ∈ UPGraph ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ { c1, c3 } ∈ c5)∧(hs0 ∈ c6 ∧ hs1 ∈ c6)), { c1, c3 } = { hs0, hs1 }, (c1 ∈ c6 ∧ c3 ∈ c6), ((c1 = hs0 ∧ c3 = hs1)∨(c1 = hs1 ∧ c3 = hs0)))
  3ad2antl2(c0 ∈ UPGraph, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), { c1, c3 } ∈ c5, (hs0 ∈ c6 ∧ hs1 ∈ c6), ({ c1, c3 } = { hs0, hs1 } ↔((c1 = hs0 ∧ c3 = hs1)∨(c1 = hs1 ∧ c3 = hs0))))
  preq12bg(c1, c2, c3, c4, hs0, c6, hs1, c6)
  adantl((c0 ∈ UPGraph ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)∧ { c1, c3 } ∈ c5), (hs0 ∈ c6 ∧ hs1 ∈ c6), (((c1 = hs0 ∧ c3 = hs1)∨(c1 = hs1 ∧ c3 = hs0))→(c1 ∈ c6 ∧ c3 ∈ c6)))
  jaod((hs0 ∈ c6 ∧ hs1 ∈ c6), (c1 = hs0 ∧ c3 = hs1), (c1 = hs1 ∧ c3 = hs0), (c1 ∈ c6 ∧ c3 ∈ c6))
  com12((hs0 ∈ c6 ∧ hs1 ∈ c6), (c1 = hs0 ∧ c3 = hs1), (c1 ∈ c6 ∧ c3 ∈ c6))

  eqcoms(c3, hs1, (hs1 ∈ c6 ↔ c3 ∈ c6))
  eleq1(hs1, c3, c6)

  im2anan9(c1 = hs1, c3 = hs0, hs1 ∈ c6, hs0 ∈ c6, c1 ∈ c6, c3 ∈ c6)
  biimpd(c1 = hs1, hs1 ∈ c6, c1 ∈ c6)
  eqcoms(c1, hs1, (hs1 ∈ c6 ↔ c1 ∈ c6))

  biimpd(c3 = hs0, hs0 ∈ c6, c3 ∈ c6)

blocks.name: umgrpredgv
blocks.content: An edge of a multigraph always connects two vertices. Analogue of ~ umgredgprv . This theorem does not hold for arbitrary pseudographs: if either ` M ` or ` N ` is a proper class, then ` { M , N } e. E ` could still hold ( ` { M , N } ` would be either ` { M } ` or ` { N } ` , see ~ prprc1 or ~ prprc2 , i.e. a loop), but ` M e. V ` or ` N e. V ` would not be true. (Contributed by AV, 27-Nov-2020.)

  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3)), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c4)))

  edgumgr(c0, { c1, c2 })
  impcom({ c1, c2 } ∈ P((Vtx ` c0)), (# ` { c1, c2 })= 2, (c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c2 ∈ c4))
  syl((# ` { c1, c2 })= 2, ({ c1, c2 } ∈ P((Vtx ` c0))→(c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c2 ∈ c4)), (c1 ∈ { c1, c2 } ∧ c2 ∈ { c1, c2 } ∧ c1 ≠ c2))

blocks.name: edglnl
blocks.content: The edges incident with a vertex ` N ` are the edges joining ` N ` with other vertices and the loops on ` N ` in a pseudograph. (Contributed by AV, 18-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: numedglnl
blocks.content: The number of edges incident with a vertex ` N ` is the number of edges joining ` N ` with other vertices and the number of loops on ` N ` in a pseudograph of finite size. (Contributed by AV, 19-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: umgredgne
blocks.content: An edge of a multigraph always connects two different vertices. Analogue of ~ umgrnloopv resp. ~ umgrnloop . (Contributed by AV, 27-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: umgrnloop2
blocks.content: A multigraph has no loops. (Contributed by AV, 27-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 30-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm umgrnloop2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wnel(cpr(c1, c1), cfv(cedg, c0)))
} = {
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cumgr), wnel(cpr(c1, c1), cfv(cedg, c0)), wn(wcel(cpr(c1, c1), cfv(cedg, c0))))
  pm2.65da(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c1), cfv(cedg, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)))
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c1), cfv(cedg, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0)))
  umgrpredgv(c0, c1, c1, cfv(cedg, c0), cfv(cvtx, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c0))
  mpsyl(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c1), cfv(cedg, c0))), wn(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0))), wceq(c1, c1), wne(c1, c1))
  eqid(c1)
  umgredgne(c0, c1, c1, cfv(cedg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cedg, c0))
  eqneqall(c1, c1, wn(wcel(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0))))
  df-nel(cpr(c1, c1), cfv(cedg, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm umgrnloop2(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ UMGraph → { c1, c1 } ∉(Edg ` c0))
} = {
  sylibr(c0 ∈ UMGraph, { c1, c1 } ∉(Edg ` c0), ¬ { c1, c1 } ∈(Edg ` c0))
  pm2.65da(c0 ∈ UMGraph, { c1, c1 } ∈(Edg ` c0), c1 ∈(Vtx ` c0))
  simpld((c0 ∈ UMGraph ∧ { c1, c1 } ∈(Edg ` c0)), c1 ∈(Vtx ` c0), c1 ∈(Vtx ` c0))
  umgrpredgv(c0, c1, c1, (Edg ` c0), (Vtx ` c0))
  eqid((Vtx ` c0))
  mpsyl((c0 ∈ UMGraph ∧ { c1, c1 } ∈(Edg ` c0)), ¬ c1 ∈(Vtx ` c0), c1 = c1, c1 ≠ c1)
  eqid(c1)
  umgredgne(c0, c1, c1, (Edg ` c0))
  eqid((Edg ` c0))
  eqneqall(c1, c1, ¬ c1 ∈(Vtx ` c0))
  df-nel({ c1, c1 }, (Edg ` c0))
}

blocks.name: umgredgnlp
blocks.content: An edge of a multigraph is not a loop. (Contributed by AV, 9-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 8-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm umgredgnlp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wn(wex(s0, wceq(c1, csn(cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  nexdv(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, csn(cv(s0))))
  nsyl3(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c1, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat2)))
  intnand(wceq(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(c1, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat2))
  mtbiri(wceq(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat2), wceq(cfv(chash, csn(cv(s0))), nat2))
  mp2b(wn(wceq(cfv(chash, csn(cv(s0))), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), universe), wceq(cfv(chash, csn(cv(s0))), nat1))
  vex(s0)
  hashsng(cv(s0), universe)
  mtbiri(wceq(cfv(chash, csn(cv(s0))), nat1), wceq(cfv(chash, csn(cv(s0))), nat2), wceq(nat1, nat2))
  neii(nat1, nat2)
  1ne2()
  eqeq1(cfv(chash, csn(cv(s0))), nat1, nat2)
  fveqeq2(c1, csn(cv(s0)), chash, nat2)
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat2)), wcel(c1, cfv(cedg, c0)))
  eleq2i(c1, c2, cfv(cedg, c0))
  edgumgr(c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c1, c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cumgr)
  diff.cumgr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm umgredgnlp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ UMGraph ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ ¬ ∃(s0, c1 = { s0 }))
  ⊣ c2 =(Edg ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  nexdv(s0, (c0 ∈ UMGraph ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c1 = { s0 })
  nsyl3((c0 ∈ UMGraph ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c1 = { s0 }, (c1 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0))∧(# ` c1)= 2))
  intnand(c1 = { s0 }, c1 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0)), (# ` c1)= 2)
  mtbiri(c1 = { s0 }, (# ` c1)= 2, (# ` { s0 })= 2)
  mp2b(¬(# ` { s0 })= 2, s0 ∈ 𝕌, (# ` { s0 })= 1)
  vex(s0)
  hashsng(s0, universe)
  mtbiri((# ` { s0 })= 1, (# ` { s0 })= 2, 1 = 2)
  neii(nat1, nat2)
  1ne2()
  eqeq1((# ` { s0 }), nat1, nat2)
  fveqeq2(c1, { s0 }, chash, nat2)
  sylan2b(c0 ∈ UMGraph, c1 ∈ c2, (c1 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0))∧(# ` c1)= 2), c1 ∈(Edg ` c0))
  eleq2i(c1, c2, (Edg ` c0))
  edgumgr(c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ UMGraph, c1 ∈ c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cumgr)
  diff.cumgr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
}
